name: Sum Sketch
description:
A quick paced game that will use simple numbers and addition to make you want to play more and more until you beat your best scores to the maximum number, which is to infinity!

All you have to do is click on the right combination of numbers making your requested sum at the moment. The requested sum will be displayed beneath the calculator that keeps the sum of your chosen numbers. All the seconds you don't use will be transferred onto the next sum giving you more seconds next time. Try it, see how far you can get.
